traits.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The warlock has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The warlock can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The warlock can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The warlock makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its Sword of Fathoms.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sword of Fathoms
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2 damage) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or begin choking. The choking creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn, when the effect ends on it.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 5 (1d10 damage) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
